name: Responsive Button Kit
description:
Created this button kit with Figma's "Autolayout", to show my co-designers on how autolayout feature in Figma simplifies responsive button design. Sharing it here so others can make use of it.
Autolayout simplifies resizing, arrangement and spacing of components designed in Figma.
This kit has
✅Button types
✅Variants for each type
✅Auto layout enabled
✅Components
✅Customisable
